thread.title: BRIEF-Golar LNG & Golar LNG Partners Announce Organizational Changes

title: BRIEF-Golar LNG & Golar LNG Partners Announce Organizational Changes

organizations.name: brief-golar lng & golar lng partners announce organizational changes reuters
brief-golar lng & golar lng partners announce organizational changes
golar lng limited & golar lng partners l.p.

text: 37 AM / in 7 minutes BRIEF-Golar LNG & Golar LNG Partners Announce Organizational Changes Reuters Staff March 19 (Reuters) - Golar Lng Ltd: * GOLAR LNG LIMITED & GOLAR LNG PARTNERS L.P. ANNOUNCE ORGANIZATIONAL CHANGES * GOLAR LNG LTD - GRAHAM ROBJOHNS WILL STEP DOWN AS CEO OF GOLAR PARTNERS AND TAKE UP ROLE OF CFO AND DEPUTY CEO OF GOLAR LNG * GOLAR LNG LTD - WITH IMMEDIATE EFFECT BRIAN TIENZO WILL STEP DOWN AS CFO OF GOLAR AND WILL TAKE UP POSITION OF CEO AND CFO OF GOLAR LNG PARTNERS Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
